name: Kid's Reading Stories
description:
A story player for my kids. 

Only one story at the moment. 

Cover and title show immediately, Press "Show" once they read the text to see the picture. Press next or back to move on to the next part of the story. Story 1 is 18 pages.

Take the time to let your kid talk about what the blurred out picture might be, getting creativity flowing and different directions the story might take. This will bring up more internal words and potentially make it easier to pick them up.
